duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle surgical instruments, supplies, and equipment during general surgical procedures under the direction and supervision of the Registered Nurse and Surgical Team members.
Anticipate the needs of the assigned surgical team and ensure understanding of the assigned surgical procedure being performed.
Provide service support related to patient preparation, patient transport, building services, and assisting the surgical care team with specific patient care duties.
Respond to emergent situations according to established procedures.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of CAAHEP accredited Surgical Technology program preferred (not required)
